title: Wynne & Joanna: All at Sea
overview: Wynne & Joanna: All at Sea follows Wynne Evans and Joanna Page as the duo embark on a fun-filled journey along the Welsh coastline. Fuelled by their friendship, and shared passions of the sea, food and love of adventure, in each episode we'll join the pair on board as they explore the spectacular Welsh coastline by sea. In this heart-warming series, they'll discover everything from secret coves to seafood recipes, famous ports to fabulous people and we'll get a sneak peek into the lives of two of Wales' most beloved stars.
